reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Not enough sensitive ... Counts only if you jump ...
reviews.author: dharmendra parmar

reviews.title: Better pedometer than most.
reviews.comment: Many pedometers on the market, that I have used, require that the screen be on or it doesn\'t register steps. This leads to several pocket calls and in one unfortunate incident, an innapropriate text message. This app works very well in the background and works even when the screen is asleep. The only con is the lack of info with the app on how to configure the settings. Can\'t tell if the height is in metres or inches. How is the weight read by the app. As well as other configuring options. Overall great app
reviews.author: Julien Legere

reviews.title: Very blah
reviews.comment: I was looking for a pedometer with more options, such as miles walked in addition to steps taken and this didn\'t deliver on the miles. Installed
reviews.author: Michelle F

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work AT ALL
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t count steps....isn\'t that what its supposed to do? It just stays at zero. Galaxy Note 2....uninstalling!
reviews.author: Mike Bowman
